1.title: Michelle and Brandon

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: When Michelle and Brandon bought this home six years ago, they were hoping to turn a fast buck. But before they could sell, Michelle fell in love with the place, thanks in large part to their Italian neighbors.

2.title: Melinda and Mike

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Three years ago, Mike and Melinda moved into his childhood home. Even though it is in one of the most sought after neighborhoods in the country, Mike just can't stand the thought of living in his parent's old house.

3.title: Kelly and Lorn

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Kelly and Lorn bought their bungalow when they were expecting their first child. To get all of the benefits of city living, some compromises had to be made. Renting their basement provided income.

4.title: Tracey and Rob

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Rob and Tracey bought their bungalow when renovating the house from the ground up sounded like a good idea. But they're busy professionals, and trying to restore an old house is more mission impossible than a labor of love.

5.title: Amy and Chris

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Their postwar bungalow won over Amy and Chris when they were young and happy to be homeowners. Then life got complicated when they had a baby and six months later and Chris's 16-year-old daughter moved in as well.

6.title: Siva and Sinna

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: After buying and renovating a two-story suburban rancher, Sinna and Siva thought they had created a flawless family home. And it was perfect until three generations started living under one roof.

7.title: Geneva and David

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: David and Geneva bought their fixer-upper in search of more room for their growing family. Four years later, the renovations are still not complete and Geneva is fed up.

8.title: Franny, Salim, Alyah and Alysha

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Franny and Salim bought a 5 bedroom family home more than 14 years after leaving East Africa. It was an ideal home for raising a family, but there are now 4 grown adults living in the home because their girls haven't move out.

9.title: Robin and Greg

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Firefighter Greg convinced his wife Robin to buy this two story house by promising he would renovate it top to bottom in no time. But six years and two kids later, there are more than a few unfinished projects.

10.title: Teresa and Brian

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: Carolyn and Jeff

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: When Jeff and Carolyn decided to buy their first house together, it was a big deal for the self described procrastinator and his long-time girlfriend. When a small character home caught Jeff's eye, she knew they had to move fast.

12.title: Linnea and Mike

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Mike and Linnea bought this house five years ago so they could raise their active family surrounded by parks and plenty of green space. With so much time spent playing outside, they can't seem to get past all of the home's issues.

13.title: Paige and Jeff

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Four years ago, Jeff and Paige discovered a beautiful beach community and instantly fell in love with it. So when a beach house became available, they jumped on it and downsized.

14.title: Tokiko and James

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: When James and Tokiko bought their rustic little rancher, they planned to turn it into a fairytale home. Five years later, James still hasn't made any changes and Tokiko is fed up. Enter designer Jillian and realtor Todd.

15.title: Linda and Cory

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: When Cory and wife Linda bought their little bungalow 11 years ago, they fell in love with the mountain-side community.... Now that their family has grown, they need the space that was completely taken over as a basement apartment.

16.title: Daniel and Rod

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Rod and Daniel took the plunge into home ownership fifteen years ago when a little charmer with a big view won them over. But jump forward to today and not a single renovation has been done.

17.title: Nicholas and Gordo

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: Nicholas and Gordo were house hunting when Gordo's parents needed to move into a place that better suits their needs. So, the couple moved into Gordo's childhood home. Now they are wondering if they will love it or list it.

18.title: Tessa and Jay

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

19.title: Theresa and David

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: When Teresa and David found this 100-year-old fixer upper in a Spanish-speaking neighborhood, they knew they had found their new home. But like many old homes, it needed a top to bottom renovation.

20.title: Betty-Lou and Eric

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: Betty-Lou and Eric love their upscale home of 23 years, but as they look to a more relaxed future, Eric sees a need to downsize. They can't agree on what to do next.

21.title: Veronica and Brendan

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

21.plot: Even after Brendan put his blood, sweat and tears into renovating the home, he still doesn't love it. Add the fact that their children are nearly grown, and he just doesn't see a future in their dysfunctional home.

22.title: Jane & Steve

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

22.plot: When Jane and Steve first stumbled across their house, they couldn't imagine living anywhere else. But their little boys have grown to huge boys and the house hasn't grown with them.

23.title: Angela & Mike

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

23.plot: Four years ago, Angela and Mike bought a quirky beach home despite its outdated style. Now they still love the location of their home, but since Angela's mom has moved in, their three bedroom beach house isn't functioning anymore.

24.title: Michele and Gary

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

24.plot: Five years ago when Gary moved into Michele's house, it seemed like a small compromise for a second chance at love. But now that the last of Michele's kids have left the nest, her devoted husband wants out of her old house.

25.title: Cynthia and Steph

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

25.plot: Eight years ago, Steph and Cynthia bought their historic house from Cynthia's mom. The home's character, location, and backyard is what won them over, but after having two kids, their home is now bursting at the seams.

26.title: Karen and Mike

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

26.plot: While Mike and Karen settled on a single level rancher, they were sold on living next to the mountains. And the outdoors are still awesome, but the house itself is another story. Seven years later, not much has changed.

1.title: Joyce & Steve

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: When Joyce and Steven bought their mountainside charmer twelve years ago, they knew it needed some work, but loved all the space. But once reality set in, the couple realized it was more than they could handle.

2.title: Holly and Chester

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: When Holly and Chester bought his parent's house 8 yrs ago, they agreed it was a starter home. But now that they've settled into life with new baby Avery, Holly's having second thoughts about leaving their little house behind.

3.title: Celine & Kevin

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: When Kevin and Celine bought their 100 yr old home eleven years ago, they looking forward to starting a new life together. But soon after the arrival of daughter Lola and son Felix, the house began showing it's true colors.

4.title: Christina & Nick

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: When first time buyers Nick and Christina found this little house in a central suburb, they snapped it up. At the time, it was easy and nice to have rental income since the house is divided into two self-contained suites.

5.title: Kavita & Sanjeev

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Fourteen years ago, Kavita and Sanjeev left the Middle East looking for the perfect place to raise their young family. The home they found was perfect when the boys were young, but now that they're grown, the space is too cramped.

6.title: Danielle & Trevor

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: When Danielle married Trevor, she agreed to move into his turn-of-the-century home. That's when she learned she wasn't the only love of Trevor's life. He loves the house, but Danielle is done with the dysfunctional layout.

7.title: Amie and Mark

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: When Mark, Amie and their two boys left an Asian metropolis two yrs ago, they were looking for a serene life in the mountains. But no experience buying mountain homes, it wasn't long before the home began darkening their spirits.

8.title: Karen and Sat

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: When Karen and Sat bought a house in a mountainside community, they wanted a large family home close to friends and family. 10 years later, they're now a family of four lost in a 5000 square foot house.

9.title: Nicola & Michael

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: When professional racecar driver Michael and his wife Nicola found their home 5 years ago it was love at first sight. The house wasn't exactly move-in ready and the layout makes it hard to keep up with their son.

10.title: Susan and Harvey

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: After falling in love 5 years ago, Susan and Harvey searched the city for a heritage house that felt like home. But now that there's a baby on the way, Susan can't see how family life fits in a 1930's character house.

11.title: Karin & Bruce

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: When dog lovers Karin and Bruce bought their home 23 years ago they immediately fell in love with the great neighborhood. Although the neighborhood has always been perfect the house has never really worked for their lifestyle.

12.title: Violet & Rob

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: When Rob moved in with his new wife Violet, he fell in love with her townhouse near the beach. But now that they're retired, Violet wants to trade her old townhouse for a more modern home where she can entertain in style.

13.title: Shanti and Marcello

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: Emily and Gary

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: Emily and Gary bought their fixer-upper after receiving an unexpected inheritance. But a stop-work order halted their renovation plans. Ready to dive into this challenge are rivals Designer Jillian Harris and Realtor Todd Talbot.

15.title: Neena and Jag

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: Neena and Jag's home may work great for their family, but it's too close for comfort when they're entertaining their growing extended family. Rivals Jillian Harris and Todd Talbot hope to give these homeowners what they need.

16.title: Melissa & Josh

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Josh, Melissa and their growing family need a more open and spacious home with more natural light.

17.title: Kelly and Steve

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: Kelly and Steve live in a four bedroom home with two growing daughters and a disjointed main floor plan. Jillian Harris hopes to save the day with a fairy tale reno. Todd Talbot plans to sell them an enchanting new home.

18.title: Nicole & Tony

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: Tony and Nicole want a charming mountain home with more space for their daughters to grow.

19.title: Eleanor and Dave

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: When Eleanor and Dave bought their family home five years ago, it was all about the amazing backyard, but they overlooked issues inside the house. Rivals Jillian Harris and Todd Talbot dive in to get them something they will love.

20.title: Gina and Jeff

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: Jeff and Gina took a big chance when they bought a fixer-upper. But, all they've done are quick fixes. Jillian Harris has high hopes of transforming their mountainside home, while Todd Talbot tries to convince to buy a new house.

21.title: Barb and Ted

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

21.plot: Barb and Ted need more space for them and their adult daughters. Jillian Harris wants to give their current home a modern update while Todd Talbot sees a new mountain home on the horizon.

22.title: Una and Christian

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

22.plot: Christian and Una need a more functional home for their two growing daughters. Jillian Harris wants to update their 88-year-old home with an open concept plan while Todd Talbot eyes a new home built in this century.

23.title: Michele and Brent

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

23.plot: Brent, Michelle and their three grown children need a home where they don't fight over space.

24.title: Kim and Randy

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

24.plot: Kim and Randy need more space and wheelchair accessibility for their growing daughters.

25.title: Liza and Shawn

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

25.plot: Liza and Shawn want a more functional home where they can raise their three children. Jillian Harris tries to turn their house into the perfect family home while Todd Talbot hopes to show that true happiness lies in a new house.

26.title: Stephanie and Stephen

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

26.plot: Stephen and Stephanie need a more open, functional space for themselves and their growing children

1.title: Joanna & Derek

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Derek and Joanna's home has too many walls and segmented rooms for their family of four's lifestyle.

2.title: Anastasia & Nimira

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Nimira and Anastasia need a home that fits their personalities and needs.

3.title: Julie & Bernard

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Bernard and Julie need a home and location that will suit their family of five.

4.title: Lorraine & Geoff

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Empty nesters Jeff and Lorraine are tired of entertaining friends and family in their choppy home.

5.title: Belinda & Sam

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Belinda, Sam and their kids want a functional, updated home in the priciest neighborhood in the city.

6.title: Penny & Chuck

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Chuck's childhood home no longer functions for his and Penny's family.

7.title: Donna & Rick

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Can this diamond in the rough turn into a real gem or is it time for Donna and Rick to dig up a new treasure?

8.title: Lisa & Chris

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: The race is on for Designer Jillian and Realtor Todd to solve this housing crisis. Jillian's betting a fabulous renovation will have Lisa putting her house before the horse, but Todd thinks that the odds are in his favor.

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot:

10.title: Alice & Jim

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Jim and Alice will have to decide, can their family of six adults love the home their in? Or should they list it?

11.title: Stephanie & Darrell

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Stephanie, Darrell and their three kids need a house with more space in a dream location.

12.title: Talia & Travis

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot:

13.title: Michelle and Mike

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: A flash flood destroyed Mike and Michelle's basement and now the family lives in half the home. Michelle is ready to move, but Mike thinks it can be fixed with a new basement. Here to help are realtor Todd and designer Jillian.

14.title: Jessica & Derek

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: A family of six living under one roof is frustrated by their lack of space, except for Dad, who doesn't see a problem. Realtor Todd finds them a home to fit their family, but designer Jillian's reno adds more room and storage.

15.title: Dawn & Brian

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: Dawn and Brian love their backyard, but need a larger inside space for their growing family. Can Jillian create an oasis from the inside out or will Todd be able to show them the grass is greener on the other side of the creek?

16.title: Lyanne & Chris

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Lyanne and Chris bought a home for their family seven years ago, but the house is now too small as the kids get bigger. Can Jillian convince them to stay by opening up their cramped, closed-off home?

17.title: Karen and Ian

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: A yoga instructor loves his family's mountainside home on the outskirts of town, but his flight attendant wife is tired of the long commute. Todd finds the family a house close to the airport, while Jillian transforms their home.

18.title: Cathy & Peter

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot:
Know what this is about?

19.title: Alia & David

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: Young music lovers have renovated half of their fixer-upper themselves, but the house is far from finished. Jillian has the daunting task of renovating three bathrooms, while Todd must find a move-in ready home with a great yard.

20.title: Candice & James

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: Will Candice and James love their home again after Jillian powers through their fixer-upper's unfinished business or will they list it for a turnkey treasure?

21.title: Lisa & Derek

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

21.plot: Can Jillian unlock the potential of this growing family's home with a re-design or will Todd woo them with a spacious open concept?

22.title: Debora & Paul

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

22.plot: Debra and Paul bought an older home three years ago. Debra is sick of all the home's flaws, but Paul still loves the place. Can Todd convince Paul a new house has character, or will Jillian help Debra see past the home's flaws?

23.title: Meg & Neal

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

23.plot: Meg and Neal bought their home 17 years ago, when their kids were young. Now that their sons are going to college, they want to downsize to a smaller home. Can Meg learn to love their home again or will Neal agree to list it?

24.title: Sabrina & Kevin

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

24.plot: Two years ago, Sabrina and Kevin bought a home sight unseen in Sabrina's childhood neighborhood. Kevin feels no connection to the home, but Sabrina can't imagine raising their future family anywhere else.

25.title: Rachelle & Tim

episode of.title: Love It or List It Vancouver (TV Series 2013– )

25.plot: Rachelle and Tim disagree about whether their current cozy house is right for a growing family. Rachelle loves the house, but Tim is tired of the confined quarters. Can they learn to love their home again, or will they list it?

imdb.plot outline: A spinoff of HGTV's successful show (2008 -) featuring real estate in the Toronto arena. The new and younger professionals in ' Love It or List It, Too' are competing for the final home choices of couples seeking their future perfect abode, but in Vancouver locations. The new offering is refreshing with more impressive real estate and locations. Like all 'reality' programs involving completions, both versions are scripted to show antagonistic, characters, but 'Too' appears to have slightly less butting of heads and less sophomoric sparring. Both shows offer good info in buying and renovating a varied selection of homes in various environments.
